about.title:
Need a Creative Product?
I can Help You!
about.subTitle: About me
about.description: Hi, I´am Florin and a passionate software developer with a strong interest in cybersecurity. With my passion for programming and expertise in IT security, I am capable of developing robust and secure software solutions. My broad knowledge in the field allows me to analyze complex problems and find innovative solutions. I have extensive experience in developing secure applications and conducting penetration tests to identify and address vulnerabilities. With my technical expertise and commitment to security, I assist companies in protecting their digital assets and minimizing cyber threats.

skills.title: What My Programming Skills Included?
skills.description: As an experienced software developer, I possess a wide range of tools and technologies that enable me to work efficiently. I am proficient in programming languages such as Java or Python and I work with frameworks like Django and Spring. Additionally, I have knowledge in working with databases such as MySQL and MongoDB. I am familiar with CI/CD tools like Jenkins and can set up automated build and deployment processes. When it comes to testing, I use JUnit and Selenium for unit tests and web application testing. For monitoring and issue tracking, I utilize tools like the ELK Stack and bug-tracking systems like Jira. Furthermore, I have experience with security tools like Burp Suite and Nessus for vulnerability assessments and penetration testing. With my diverse skill set and range of tools, I am capable of successfully implementing various software projects.

projects.title: See My Works Which Will Amaze You!
projects.description: I have worked on a variety of exciting software projects throughout my career that have tested my knowledge and skills. From developing custom e-commerce platforms to implementing secure payment systems, I have successfully tackled complex tasks. However, not all of my projects can be publicly showcased due to proprietary or confidential reasons.
